樻字的基本解释

樻
guì
古书上说的椐一类的小树，茎多肿节，可以做拐杖。
古同“柜”，收藏东西用的家具。

樻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuì］
［《廣韻》求位切，去至，羣。］
［《廣韻》丘愧切，去至，溪。］
(1)木名。即椐。又名灵寿木。
(2)通“櫃”。

樻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樻； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页552第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?求位切，音匱。【說文】椐也。【廣韻】木腫節，可爲杖。詳椐字註。　又【唐韻】丘愧切，音喟。樻梧樹。【類篇】卽靈壽木也。【前漢·孔光傳】詔賜靈壽杖。　又【集韻】苦軌切，音巋。義同。

樻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
樻字的起名意思

暂无。

樻
Basic explanation of words
樻
guì
As mentioned in ancient books, small trees such as stilts have swollen stems and can be used as crutches.
Gutong "cabinet", furniture for storing things.
樻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuì］
["Guangyun" Seek position, go to, group. ]
["Guangyun" Qiu Qiqi, go to, stream. ]
(1) Wooden name. That is, 椐. Also known as Lingshoumu.
(2) Through the "cabinet".
樻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樻; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 552 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Seek position, lack of sound. [Said the text] 椐 also. [Guangyun] Wooden swollen knot, can be a stick. Detailed note of the word.　[Tang Yun] Qiu is ashamed and cut, and the sound is 喟. The sycamore tree. 【Classes】Ling Ling Shoumu also. [Previous Han·Kong Guang Chuan] Zhao bestows a longevity stick.　[Jiyun] The bitter track is cut, the sound is 岿. The same meaning.
